reviews: Pricise, crisp and clear app on crop management. its a very useful app. content is very nicely packed. almost all common crops (kerala mostly) and its pest/disease/nutrient management and practices are covered. i strongly recommend this app.
It's awesome. Very useful. But need some photos to experience & identify the disease and pest attack on crops. Expecting an update regarding the above
The App is excellent and highly useful. One suggestion I have is to provide more Malayalam content and also photos of diseases and symptoms for cross checking.
Verymuch helpful and informative. Can improve by adding photos too,so that we can identify the problem more correctly by comparing symptoms.
More of an ebook type rather an app. The app should be modified in such a way it encourage even a beginner to start farming.
There are a few mistakes in the contact addresses in Malayalam...The app is good

Very well set up app by Kerala Agricultural University. Very very informative and useful for whole farmers community, students, faculty and all fellow keralites and more. Very well executed. Farmers encyclopaedia as it is.
